story_teamrocket_03_09000/2401_1001_0100:
It’s about time I took my leave. I’ve had a very
fruitful time here.
story_teamrocket_03_09000/2401_1001_0200:
After battling you, I know exactly what kind of
force I need to completely control Pasio.
story_teamrocket_03_09000/2401_1001_0300:
And over the past few days, I’ve seen a fair
number of things that sparked my interest.
story_teamrocket_03_09000/2401_1001_0400: From Trainers who insist on battling alone...
story_teamrocket_03_09000/2401_1001_0500:
to those who seek pure strength, no matter
the method...
story_teamrocket_03_09000/2401_1001_0600:
There are a number of children here who already
have eyes that look like an adult’s.
story_teamrocket_03_09000/2401_1001_0700: Pasio is an interesting place indeed.
story_teamrocket_03_09000/2401_1001_1000:
I constantly think a few steps ahead of my
opponents—and plan contingencies just in case.
story_teamrocket_03_09000/2401_1001_1100: Giovanni! Archer! I’ve come to fetch you!
story_teamrocket_03_09000/2401_1001_1400: I look forward to the day we battle again.
story_teamrocket_03_09000/2401_1001_1600: Giovanni... He really was a tough opponent.
story_teamrocket_03_09000/2401_1001_1700:
We can’t beat him as we are now. We’ve gotta
get stronger!
